remarks: Extension of a walk (as word) by adding an edge/vertex.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 5-Aug-2018.)
statement: wwlknextbi $p |- ( ( ( N e. NN0 /\ S e. V ) /\ ( T e. Word V /\ W = ( T ++ <" S "> ) /\ { ( lastS ` T ) , S } e. ran E ) ) -> ( W e. ( ( V WWalksN E ) ` ( N + 1 ) ) <-> T e. ( ( V WWalksN E ) ` N ) ) ) $.
